programme.title: The Canadian Caper in Tehran, 1979
programme.short_synopsis: The Canadian rescue of US diplomats during the 1979 seizure of the US embassy in Tehran.
programme.medium_synopsis: America shows gratitude to Canada after it was revealed that the Canadian embassy in Tehran rescued six US diplomats during the seizure of the US embassy on 4th November 1979.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: The Canadian Caper in Tehran, 1979

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
